message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $140 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $130.  It's a fair price considering the value it offers.
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but I'm still a bit short of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
